ygData.subject: Re: mana
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/7/99 2:13:01 PM EST, fire3@rocketmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/7/99 2:13:01 PM EST, fire3@... writes:

<< does the mana you have get increased immediately when you
add +int equipment, or does it only increase it after you
level? what i mean is, do you get the same increase for
getting a +2 int earing and first wearing it at level 15,
as you would if you have had it since level 1? >>

At the moment you put it on it gives it take it off it takes it away ... my
estimate is +2 earings dont really give as much mana increase untill lvl 34
before then maybe mana items better , but im guessing.
Im loaded now with 160 modified intel and skull and book for an extra 60
mana at lvl 30.

Zakrell
